&BIMode.Structure.Check;
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @stt_rec varchar(32), @status char(1), @wsID varchar(8), @vcDate smalldatetime, @dUpdate datetime, @line int select @stt_rec = stt_rec, @status = status from bim01$000000 where ma_bp0 = @ma_bp0 and ma_vt = @ma_vt and ma_vung = @ma_vung
select @dUpdate = getdate(), @vcDate = convert(char(8), @dUpdate, 112) if @stt_rec is null begin select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' create table #idNumber (stt_rec varchar(32)) insert into #idNumber exec AI_ERP$App$GetIdentityNumber @wsID, 'P01', 'bim01$000000', @@userID select @stt_rec = stt_rec, @status = '1' FROM #idNumber
insert into bim01$000000(stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_ct, ma_bp0, ma_vt, ma_vung, dien_giai, status, user_id0, user_id2, datetime0, datetime2) select @stt_rec, @ma_dvcs, 'P01', @ma_bp0, @ma_vt, @ma_vung, '', '1', @@userID, @@userID, @dUpdate, @dUpdate
set @q = 'stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_DefaultValue 1, 'bim01$000000', 'stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_ct, ma_bp0, ma_vt, ma_vung, dien_giai, status, user_id0, user_id2, datetime0, datetime2', 1, default, @q end update bim01$000000 set user_id2 = @@userID, datetime2 = @dUpdate where stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @line = max(line_nbr) + 1 from bid01$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec select top 0 * into #d01 from bid01$000000 select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i01 from bii01$000000
insert into #d01(stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_ct, ma_kh, vung_cu, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, cd_ncc, ghi_chu, so_tc, ngay_tc, ma_nguon, line_nbr) select @stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(isnull(@line, 1)), 'P01', @ma_kh, '', @ngay_hl_tu, @ngay_hl_den, @cd_ncc, @ghi_chu, @so_ct, @ngay_ct, 'PQ2', isnull(@line, 1) where not exists(select 1 from bid01$000000 x where x.stt_rec = @stt_rec and x.ma_kh = @ma_kh and (x.ngay_hl_tu is null or x.ngay_hl_tu <= @ngay_hl_den) and (x.ngay_hl_den is null or x.ngay_hl_den >= @ngay_hl_tu))
exec rs_DefaultValue 2, '#d01', 'stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_ct, ma_kh, vung_cu, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, cd_ncc, ghi_chu, so_tc, ngay_tc, ma_nguon, line_nbr', 1 insert into bid01$000000 select * from #d01
if exists(select 1 from #d01) begin truncate table #d01 insert into #d01 select * from bid01$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec insert into #i01 select stt_rec, null, '', ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, rtrim(ma_dvcs) + rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(ma_vung) + rtrim(ma_vt) + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_vung) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_vt), '' from bim01$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i01', '#d01', 'd$', 'ma_kh, vung_cu, ma_nguon', '#10$, #20$, #30$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q
delete bii01$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec insert into bii01$000000(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$) select stt_rec, ngay_ct, '', ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_vung, @status, @@userID, c$, m$, d$ from #i01 end
select '' as field, '' as messeage, 'insert$&Identity;Filter$QueryComplete(this);' as script return

var f=this,id=f.get_id(),d1=f.getItemValue("ngay_hl_tu"),d2=f.getItemValue("ngay_hl_den");if(f._checked&&d1>d2){var msg=f._language=="v"?'Trường Ngày hiệu lực đến phải lớn hơn hoặc bằng trường Ngày hiệu lực từ.':'Effective date to must be larger than or equal to Effective date from.';$func.hideWait(id);$message.show(msg,String.format("$find('{0}').getItem('ngay_hl_den').focus()",id));f._checked=false}
